game.name: 下地狱吧，人渣
game.shortDescription: In this side-scrolling adventure puzzle game, you will play as a pair of siblings exploring the "Hell" academy. An eerie floating doll disrupts your peaceful life, forcing you and your brother to embark on a one-way journey to Hell. However, what is known as Hell turns out to be a mysterious academy
